rewrite.headline: The Gopakumar–Vafa finiteness conjecture
rewrite.teaser: The Gopakumar–Vafa conjecture predicts that the BPS invariants of a symplectic $6$-manifold, defined in terms of the Gromov–Witten invariants, are integers and all but finitely many vanish in every homology class. The integrality part of this conjecture was proved earlier … Continue reading →

rewrite.headline: Long time derivation of the Boltzmann equation from hard sphere dyamics
rewrite.teaser: We provide a rigorous derivation of Boltzmann’s kinetic equation from the hard sphere system for rarefied gas, which is valid for arbitrarily long times, as long as the (regular) solution to the Boltzmann equation exists. This extends Lanford’s landmark theorem … Continue reading →
